response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and I believe it can significantly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I understand its worth is estimated at $15,000. My proposal is to offer it to you for $14,000. This price reflects the quality and value of the product while ensuring a fair return for us. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
